title: Napoleon in 1812 - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Mature   Psychological
tags: Aristocracy   Army   Army Building   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Empires   European Ambience   Famous Protagonist   Firearms   Generals   Genius Protagonist   Gunfighters   Interdimensional Travel   Kingdom Building   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Military   Multiple POV   Parallel Worlds   Politics   Royalty   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Transmigration   Wars

description:
Napoleon Bonaparte, who defeated Austria, Prussia, Russia and Britain and became the true ruler of Europe.

After the revolution, he stepped down as president, enjoying his retirement in Louisiana.

One day, he opened his eyes… and was the Emperor?

The story of Napoleon, who woke up in a parallel world just before the Russian campaign.>
